title: NEW: Shorts Ad Revenue, New Paths to YPP, Earlier Fan Funding, Shorts Super Thanks and More!

media:group.media:title: NEW: Shorts Ad Revenue, New Paths to YPP, Earlier Fan Funding, Shorts Super Thanks and More!
media:group.media:description:
We're excited to announce updates coming to YouTube! First, we’re announcing more ways for creators to get into the YouTube Partner Program. Second, we’re rolling out new ways for Shorts creators to sustainably grow on YouTube, with ad revenue sharing and Super Thanks. And we're introducing Creator Music – a new destination in YouTube Studio that gives creators easy access to an ever-growing catalog of music for use in their videos while still earning money from ads. 

For more info, check out these resources:
https://blog.youtube/news-and-events/supporting-the-next-wave-of-creative-entrepreneurs
https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/12475004
https://support.google.com/youtube/thread/175575648

0:00 Updates Coming to YouTube
0:45 New Paths to Join the YouTube Partner Program
2:14 Shorts Ad Revenue Sharing
3:14 Super Thanks on Shorts
3:29 Creator Music
